features.name: Upload a scorecard
features.description: Upload a PDF, image, or pasted text scorecard to generate your analysis.
howTo: Open the Dashboard and choose PDF/Image or Paste Text.
Upload your file or paste the scorecard text.
Review the extracted snippet and hit Analyze.

features.name: Latest analysis summary
features.description: See the most recent mock summary, signals, and confidence callouts.
howTo: Open the Dashboard and look for the Latest analysis card.
Review the summary and top signal callouts.
Jump into actions or plan from the same page.

features.name: Next best actions
features.description: Your highest-leverage action list with reasoning and time boxes.
howTo: Scroll to the Next Best Actions card.
Pick the top 2 actions and schedule them today.
Mark actions done to keep your streak.

features.name: 7-day plan pathway
features.description: Day-wise plan that turns the actions into a weekly pathway.
howTo: Open the 7-day plan card.
Start with Day 1 and follow the drills.
Come back daily to keep the loop moving.

features.name: Checklist + Notes
features.description: Mark actions done and log reflections for each action.
howTo: Use the checklist to mark actions complete.
Add notes under each action to capture wins or blockers.
Saved notes appear as history under each action.

features.name: History timeline
features.description: Browse past attempts and reopen any analysis.
howTo: Open History to see the latest attempts.
Click any card to open the analysis in the Dashboard.
Use the empty-state CTA to analyze your first mock.

features.name: Account settings
features.description: Update profile, theme, export data, or delete account.
howTo: Open Account from the header.
Update exam goal, weekly hours, or theme.
Use export or delete actions at the bottom.
